files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
# Ignore docs files
_gh_pages
_site

# Ignore ruby files
.ruby-version
.bundle
vendor/cache
vendor/bundle

# Numerous always-ignore extensions
*.diff
*.err
*.log
*.orig
*.rej
*.swo
*.swp
*.vi
*.zip
*~

# OS or Editor folders
._*
.cache
.DS_Store
.idea
.project
.settings
.tmproj
*.esproj
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace
nbproject
Thumbs.db

# Komodo
.komodotools
*.komodoproject

# SCSS-Lint
scss-lint-report.xml

# grunt-contrib-sass cache
.sass-cache

# Jekyll metadata
docs/.jekyll-metadata

# Folders to ignore
#bower_components
node_modules

files.name: .npmignore
files.content:
**/.*
node_modules
bower_components
test
tests
js
img
fonts
css
index.html
device-mockups/**/*.psd

files.name: CREDITS.txt
files.content:
For this resource we have used many different resources already provided by other designers. They have enabled us to realise this project and we are forever grateful to them.

— Resources in Vector PSD’s —
Apple iPhone 5 Black:
http://dribbble.com/shots/727359-iPhone-5-freebie
Apple iPhone 5 White:
http://dribbble.com/shots/728073-iPhone-5-Psd-Vector-Mockup
Apple iPad 2 Black/White:
http://dribbble.com/shots/506436-The-new-iPad-template
Apple iMac 27’:
http://dribbble.com/shots/438772-iMac-27-Fully-Scalable-PSD
Samsung Galaxy SIII Black/White:
http://dribbble.com/shots/710269-Galaxy-S-III-White-Black-PSD-Template
Google Nexus 7:
http://dribbble.com/shots/651435-Nexus-7-PSD
Microsoft Surface:
http://dribbble.com/shots/860650-Freebie-Microsoft-Surface-RT-psd-and-ai-templates
Nokia Lumia 920:
http://dribbble.com/shots/780376-lumia-920-yellow
— New devices added 10.11.2014 —

Samsung Galaxy S5:
http://www.pixeden.com/psd-mock-up-templates/samsung-galaxy-s5-psd-mockup

Apple iPad Air:
http://www.pixeden.com/psd-mock-up-templates/ipad-air-psd-vector-mockup

Apple iPhone 6:
https://dribbble.com/shots/1717398-iPhone-6-Scalable-Mockups-4-7

Apple iPhone 6 Plus:
http://www.pixeden.com/psd-mock-up-templates/iphone-6-plus-psd-vector-mockup

Nokia Lumia 930:
https://www.behance.net/gallery/17569587/Lumia-930-Mockup

Motorola Nexus 6:
http://graphicburger.com/nexus-6-psd-mockup/

Samsung TV:
http://themt.deviantart.com/art/Photoshop-da-Samsung-Smart-TV-PSD-Yapmak-288963322


— New devices added 24.03.2015 —

Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 10.1", & 8"

- New devices added by ben182

- Devices added by pixelsign 28.04.2017

iPhone 7 & 7plus

files.name: README.md
files.content:
[![Gitter](https://img.shields.io/gitter/room/nwjs/nw.js.svg)](https://gitter.im/html5-device-mockups/Lobby) [![GitHub release](https://img.shields.io/github/release/pixelsign/html5-device-mockups.svg)]() [![Bower](https://img.shields.io/bower/v/html5-device-mockups.svg)]() [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/html5-device-mockups.svg)]() [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) HTML5 device mockups v3 :iphone::computer: ==================== You can view the demo page here: Use on... * Your website / splash screen For... * Displaying photos * Displaying screenshots of your app(s) * Displaying reference works / illustrations * Displaying a content rotator / slideshow * Embedding a JavaScript app inside the device * Embedding a YouTube video Why? * Looks cool * Attracts customers * Makes your site look professional * Give people the idea that your app/site works on mobile * Give the impression that your illustrations are meant for web/mobile * Lots of screenshots in just one "device" Features: * Maintains the device's aspect ratio when scaled * Perfectly aligned screen content containers * Some devices have "home button" layer defined for possible click event bindings * Multiple color schemes * Multiple orientations * 86 different device images Devices ------- | Name | Filename | Orientations | Colors | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Chromebook | Chromebook | portrait | black | | Galaxy S3 | galaxyS3 | portrait, landscape | black, white | | Galaxy S5 | galaxyS5 | portrait, landscape | black, white, gold | | Galaxy Tab 4 | galaxyTab4 | portrait | black, white | | HTC One M8 | HtcOneM8 | portrait, landscape | black | | Huawei P8 | HuaweiP8 | portrait, landscape | gold | | iMac | iMac | portrait | black | | iPad | iPad | portrait, landscape | black, white | | iPad Air 2 | iPadAir2 | portrait, landscape | black, white, gold | | iPad Pro | iPadPro | portrait, landscape | black, white, gold | | iPhone 6 | iPhone6 | portrait, landscape | black, white, gold | | iPhone 6 Plus | iPhone6Plus | portrait, landscape | black, white, gold | | iPhone SE | iPhoneSE | portrait, landscape | black, white, gold, pink | | iPhone 5 | iPhone5 | portrait, landscape | black, white | | iPhone 6 Hand | iPhone6Hand | portrait | black, white | | iPhone 7 Hand | iPhone7Hand | portrait | black | | iPhone 7 Hand 2 | iPhone7Hand_2 | portrait | black | | iPhone 7 | iPhone7 | portrait, landscape | black, white, gold, pink, red | | iPhone X | iPhoneX | portrait, landscape | black | | Lumia 930 | Lumia930 | portrait, landscape | black, white | | Macbook | Macbook | portrait | black, white, gold | | Macbook 2015 | Macbook2015 | portrait | black, white, gold | | MacbookPro | Macbook2015 | portrait | black | | Pixel | Pixel | portrait | black, white | | Samsung TV | SamsungTV | portrait | black | | Surface Pro 3 | SurfacePro3 | landscape | black | | Surface Studio | SurfaceStudio | portrait | black | ## Integrating to your website: ### Bower ``` bower install html5-device-mockups ``` ### npm ``` npm i html5-device-mockups ``` ### Old traditional way ``` ``` ## Usage Use this example or grap the code from the HTML generator on our demo site: ```
``` ## FAQ "I can not control the height of the device" Created by: --- > Tomi Hiltunen > * tomi@innovaniac.com > * http://innovaniac.com > Angelos Arnis > * angelos.arnis@gmail.com > * http://dribbble.com/pixelsign > Benjamin Bortels > * moin@benjaminbortels.de > * https://benjaminbortels.de Credits for the original graphical renderings of the devices used in this package are found in a separate file which is provided with this package.

files.name: bower.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "html5-device-mockups",
  "description": "HTML5 mockups of popular devices, to showcase your portfolio and spice up your website.",
  "main": "dist/device-mockups.css",
  "license": "MIT",
  "homepage": "https://pixelsign.github.io/html5-device-mockups",
  "ignore": [
    "**/.*",
    "node_modules",
    "bower_components",
    "test",
    "tests",
    "src",
    "js",
    "img",
    "fonts",
    "css",
    "index.html",
    "device-mockups/**/*.psd"
  ]
}

files.name: index.html
files.content:
Pixelsign

Create stunning showcases

Spice up your website with live HTML5 mockups of popular devices

Grab it on Github
Made by Tomi Hiltunen, Angelos Arnis and Benjamin Bortels
